languages.text: "Впрочем, мы вынуждены напомнить вам, что Дом Орселлио сейчас переживает... неспокойные времена. Мы рады быть союзниками Вольного Торговца, однако пока мы не решим наши внутренние и внешние конфликты, мы не сможем помогать вам в полную силу".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, мы вынуждены напомнить вам, что Дом Орселлио сейчас переживает... неспокойные времена. Мы рады быть союзниками Вольного Торговца, однако пока мы не решим наши внутренние и внешние конфликты, мы не сможем помогать вам в полную силу".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, мы вынуждены напомнить вам, что Дом Орселлио сейчас переживает... неспокойные времена. Мы рады быть союзниками Вольного Торговца, однако пока мы не решим наши внутренние и внешние конфликты, мы не сможем помогать вам в полную силу".

traits.locale_text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “不过，我们必须提醒您，目前奥赛罗家族处于……动荡之中。我们很乐意成为行商浪人的盟友，但在我们的内部矛盾与外部冲突得到解决之前，恐怕我们只能为您提供极其有限的协助。”
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."

traits.locale_text: “不过，我们必须提醒您，目前奥塞罗家族处于……动荡之中。我们很乐意成为行商浪人的盟友，但在我们的内部矛盾与外部冲突得到解决之前，恐怕我们只能为您提供极其有限的协助。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Sin embargo, es mi deber recordarle que son tiempos... turbulentos para la casa Orsellio. Será un placer llamarnos sus aliados, Comerciante Independiente, pero hasta que podamos resolver nuestros conflictos internos y externos, nuestra capacidad para ayudarle será limitada».
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, es mi deber recordarle que son tiempos... turbulentos para la casa Orsellio. Será un placer llamarnos sus aliados, Comerciante Independiente, pero hasta que podamos resolver nuestros conflictos internos y externos, nuestra capacidad para ayudarle será limitada».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「とはいえ、オーセリオ家にとって、今は激動の時であることを忘れないでもらいたい。自由開拓者と同盟を組めることは喜ばしいが、内外の対立が解決するまでは我々の援助は限られたものになるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."

traits.locale_text: 「とはいえ、オーセリオ家にとって、今は激動の時であることを忘れないでもらいたい。自由開拓者と同盟を組めることは喜ばしいが、内外の対立が解決するまでは我々の援助は限られたものになるだろう」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Dennoch müssen wir Euch daran erinnern, dass ... das Haus Orsellio turbulente Zeiten durchmacht. Wir sind gerne Verbündete {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, aber bis zur Klärung unserer internen und externen Konflikte können wir Euch nur eingeschränkt unterstützen."
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."

traits.locale_text: "Dennoch müssen wir Euch daran erinnern, dass ... das Haus Orsellio turbulente Zeiten durchmacht. Wir sind gerne Verbündete {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, aber bis zur Klärung unserer internen und externen Konflikte können wir Euch nur eingeschränkt unterstützen."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Nous devons malgré tout vous rappeler que la maison Orsellio traverse une période... difficile. Nous sommes bien entendus ravis de joindre nos forces à celles {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais tant que les conflits qui secouent notre maison, aussi bien internes qu'externes, ne seront pas résolus, nous ne pourrons pas vous être d'une grande aide. »
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons malgré tout vous rappeler que la maison Orsellio traverse une période... difficile. Nous sommes bien entendus ravis de joindre nos forces à celles {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais tant que les conflits qui secouent notre maison, aussi bien internes qu'externes, ne seront pas résolus, nous ne pourrons pas vous être d'une grande aide. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Yalnız Orsellio Hanesi'nin çalkantılı bir dönemden geçtiğini hatırlatmama izin verin. Hür Tacir'in müttefiki olmaktan son derece mutlu olmakla birlikte iç ve dış çatışmalarımız çözülmeden size tam kapasitemizle destek olabilmemiz mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, we must remind you that this is a... turbulent time for House Orsellio. We are delighted to be allies of the Rogue Trader, but until our internal and external conflicts are resolved, our capacity for assisting you will be limited."

traits.locale_text: "Bunun Orsellio Hanesi için çalkantılı bir dönem olduğunu hatırlatmama izin verin ama. Hür Tacir'in müttefiki olduğumuz için son derece mutluyuz ancak iç ve dış çatışmalarımız çözülmeden önce size tam kapasitemizle destek olabilmemiz mümkün değil."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
